verses.text: \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H0241"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ceremonies \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* fulfill \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* work.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* us \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w present|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mediator \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* shew \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* thyself \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w likeness|strong="H8544"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* abide \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* adore \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H8029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \w generation|strong="H8029"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4687"\w* shewing mercy unto many \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H0157"\w* that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H4687"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* taketh \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* upon \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w it|strong="H6942"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee.
\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou labour, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w works|strong="H5647"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein, thou \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy manservant \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy ass, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thy manservant \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thyself.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w also|strong="H3068"\w* didst \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* thence \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* hath \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou shouldst \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Honour thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst \w live|strong="H0748"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* kill.
\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w commit|strong="H5003"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*.
\w And|strong="H1589"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*.
\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou bear \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H7453"\w* thy neighbour.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* thy neighbourâ€™s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* manservant, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ass, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w adding|strong="H3254"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tables \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* saw \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w burn|strong="H1197"\w*, \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath shewn \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w majesty|strong="H3519"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* proved \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w man|strong="H0120"\w* hath \w lived|strong="H8432"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* exceeding \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w Are|strong="H4100"\w* \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w What|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* speaketh \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* able \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*?

\w Approach|strong="H7126"\w* thou rather: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w*.
